title: Secret Training Plan!
detail_text: <:th_ch0103/>Thank you, Emma-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Ehehe, I’m happy if I could be of help. But was I really that useful? You were the one who decided the route for the trail run, and I was just following behind, you know, Kanan-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>No, you were a huge help. I know the dangerous locations in my local mountains, but that’s usually because other people told me about them, so I didn’t really understand why they are dangerous. But you taught me how to recognize them by how the trees grew or by the grasses that grew on them, right, Emma-chan? That’s really useful knowledge. It’s going to help me a lot with future route planning!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Is that so? But, if you’re happy about it, then it must be so, right. Fufu, I’m glad. Ah, that’s right! Ayumu-chan gave me something. She told me to share it with you, so I brought it with me<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Hmm? What is it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Ta-da! It’s honey lemon~! You can make delicious soda with this~. And it’ll taste even better if you put in a little bit of grated ginger!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Uwaa, amazing! I want to try drinking a honey lemon soda! ....But, how about we make it taste way better.... by going for another round of trail run!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>It’ll taste even better? Sure, I’ll go!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>A reward also makes us practice harder, right. Let’s go!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Yeah!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
